meanings.sent1: The bluejackets worked hard on the ship.
meanings.sent3: The bluejackets told jokes during their break.
meanings.sent4: The bluejackets navigated the sea with skill.
meanings.sent5: The bluejackets sang sea shanties late into the night.

meanings.definition: A type of bird in the thrush family.
meanings.sent1: I saw a group of bluejackets flying in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The bluejackets chirped melodiously in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The bluejackets built a nest on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The bluejackets soared gracefully above the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The bluejackets had vibrant feathers that caught the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of jacket worn by sailors.
meanings.sent1: The bluejackets kept warm in their thick jackets.
meanings.sent2: The bluejackets wore their bluejackets proudly.
meanings.sent3: The bluejackets embroidered their names on their bluejackets.
meanings.sent4: The bluejackets hung their bluejackets neatly in the cabin.
meanings.sent5: The bluejackets' bluejackets had shiny brass buttons.
